entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or a few wet flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 3.

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
